channel.title: Jar Fileing
channel.description:
When I complete the jar file and sign it, I upload it onto my website and make a html page that runs it. But I get a X in the top left corner... I right clicked the java applet and clicked open java console. It shows the following error:
load: client can't be instantiated. java.lang.InstantiationException: client at java.lang.Class.newInstance0(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
What does this mean, and how would I go about fixing it? Please help if you can, thanks! :eek:

item.title: Jar Fileing
